text: There are two different kinds of archery records in Malaysia and certified by the National Archery Association of Malaysia (NAAM): * National record, more commonly referred to in Malaysia as the rekod kebangsaan: the best score recorded anywhere in the world by an archer or team holding Malaysian citizenship. * Malaysian All-Comers record: the best score recorded within Malaysia by an archer or team regardless of nationality. Key to tables: Legend: # – Record awaiting ratification by National Archery Association of Malaysia; WR – World record; AS – Asian record; CR – Commonwealth record ==Current Malaysian national records== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; width: 98%;" !width=8%|Event !width=6%|Record !width=16%|Athlete !width=12%|Date !width=17%|Meet !width=18%|Place !width=3%|Ref |-bgcolor="#DDDDDD" !
